ü§ù The *Strengthening Trust in Climate Scientists* megastudy is a collaborative research project to test short, text-based online interventions intended to strengthen people's trust in climate scientists in the United States. 


üìù Many researchers have participated in our [**call for collaboration**](call_for_collaborations.qmd). The call is **now closed**, and our advisory board has made a selection for the interventions to be tested.
